text: Michel Am-Nondokro Djotodia (born c. 1949) is a Central Africa politician. He was elected President of the Central African Republic in 2013.Patrick Fort, "Religious tensions rise in Central African Republic" , AFP, 1 April 2013."Rebels, opposition form government in CentrAfrica: decree" , AFP, 31 March 2013. His predecessor was François Bozizé. He left office on 10 January 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:Presidents of the Central Africa Republic Category:Living people
title: Michel Djotodia
